message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you that I believe you'll find very valuable. I'm offering you this product at a price that's significantly below its true market value, making this a truly exceptional deal. I'm confident you'll see the immense potential in this product and recognize the immense value it holds.  I understand you're a shrewd businessman, so I've priced it competitively at $1,200,000. This gives you a substantial profit margin and a chance to capitalize on a truly unique opportunity.  Let me know your thoughts.
